name: Entangled Hearts (Sayumi101)
description:
Story

Prince Cas had his work cut out for him- cursed by a dragon whilst still in his Mother's womb, he is fated to suffer excruciating pain and nightmares come nightfall. Once he turns eighteen, he sets off in search of a cure before the curse can spread to his heart. 

On the way, he encounters Damian, a no-nonsense mercenary who would be on his side as long as he's paid one gold a day and a little fairy that communicates exclusively in soft buzzes and kaomojis.

Play as Cas as he adventures onwards. 

Learn more about his people, his travel companions and most importantly about Cas himself. Will he be able to cure his predicament or die a premature death as foretold by the elders?

Features 

  • ~37k words
  • 4 CGd
  • Slight Branching Plot
  • Slow-burn Romance
  • Drama! (because why not)
  • One soft boi and one angy boi
  • Mostly custom soundtrack

Team:

Art:

  • Character Design and Sprites :  Tsy
  • CG Artists :  mishantics & rainyholmes
  • Title Card Artist : Millasai

Music:

  • Composer : Elias Schröter
  • Vocals : Natascha Weindler

*The entire game was made in the span of one Month for NaNoRenO'2023
